faqs.question: Does TradeChainly trade for me?
faqs.answer: No, TradeChainly is not a trading platform. You execute trades on your preferred crypto exchange, then transfer the data into TradeChainly to track and analyze your trading performance.

faqs.question: How will TradeChainly help me as a trader?
faqs.answer: TradeChainly follows a traders-first approach. Every feature is built around our core philosophy: how will this feature help traders? With simplicity, ease of use, and automation at the forefront, you can start using it immediately.

faqs.question: How do I connect my exchange to TradeChainly?
faqs.answer: Simply connect your exchange to TradeChainly, and your trades will be automatically synced. You can also upload CSV files or manually enter trades. It’s quick, secure, and hassle-free.

faqs.question: How secure is TradeChainly?
faqs.answer: Security is top priority to us. TradeChainly can never trade on your behalf, access your funds, or share your data, which stays private and under your control.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, and you won’t be charged for the next billing cycle.
